text: You and Me, No Matter What
trans: 你和我的羁绊

text: After a picnic on the mountaintop, 姬塔 and company descend the mountain. They hear shouts for help coming from nearby and rush over to find monsters attacking defenseless hikers.
trans: 结束了山顶的野餐后，姬塔和同伴们开始下山。他们听到附近有求救的声音，赶过去发现有魔物在袭击毫无防备能力的登山者。

text: Vane, Lancelot, 姬塔, and company return from their mountaintop picnic.
trans: 维恩，兰斯洛特，姬塔他们从山顶的野餐中返回。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: The view from the peak and those pretty pink flowers were amazing! What a wonderful place that was!
trans: 那些可爱的粉红花瓣，还有山顶的景色都太美了，真是个有趣的地方呢！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Ditto! If I had my way, I would've stayed a little longer.
trans: 啊，如果可以的话，真想待的更久一点呢！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Sorry about that! Believe me, I wanted to stay longer myself, but leaving while the weather's on our side is the safest thing to do.
trans: 抱歉抱歉，我也想说慢慢来，但是山上的天气有时候很危险哦。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Going down the mountain's more dangerous than up, and you never know when the weather might change around here.
trans: 而且下山的路途中不知道什么时候天气就会变化了，有点担心所以还是稍微早点离开吧。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane's right. Leaving early means that we're prepared for any trouble that might come up along the way.
trans: 嗯，正如维恩所说，这样就留出充足的准备时间，如果遇到什么事情也可以做好准备。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Don't worry—we'll come again next year! Right, 姬塔?
trans: 明年我们再一起过来吧，呐，姬塔？

text: 姬塔 gives a firm nod in answer.
trans: 姬塔肯定地点头。

text: Just then, the group hears shrill screams pierce through the air.
trans: 就在这时，他们听到一声尖叫撕破天空。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Whoa! Speaking of trouble!
trans: 呃！刚才的声音是……

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Hurry! It came from this way!
trans: 快点，这边！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Can you come with us, everyone?
trans: 团长你们可以一起过来吗？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Bet on it! We can keep up!
trans: 交给我们吧！我们也一起过去！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: We will! Don't worry about us! This path shouldn't be too hard for us to cross.
trans: 是的！不用担心我们，这种程度的山路对于我们已经不是问题了！

text: 姬塔 nods eagerly.
trans: 姬塔也点头肯定。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Okay! Stay close!
trans: 好的！那么跟紧我一起来！

text: After pushing their way through the rough path, the group finds two people cornered at the edge of a cliff by vicious monsters.
trans: 经过了难走的山路，他们发现有两个人被魔物逼到悬崖的边缘。

name: Frightened Man
text: Eeek! G-get away!
trans: 不，不要过来！

name: Frightened Woman
text: Help! Someone! Anyone!
trans: 有谁来，谁来帮帮我们！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: We're here to help! Ready, Vane?
trans: 已经没问题了！维恩！准备好战斗吗？

name: Vane/维恩
text:
Ready, Lancey!
Everyone, cover us!
trans: 没问题兰酱！拜托你们掩护了！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Let's roll!
trans: 战斗开始！
scene_chr370_q1_s10
